name: Sixpack Token (SIXP)
description: Sixpack Miner is a community-driven fitness platform that promotes healthier lifestyles by rewarding physical activity. Both crypto and non-crypto companies can use Sixpack Miner to create their own "Energy Clubs," motivating employees, clients, users, and other communities to stay active daily while taking social responsibility and benefiting from promoting their products through sports and engaging rewards within a shared, thriving network of communities.
